name: About pimpin
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub's home.

This is a demo repository to make [my own personal page on Github.](http://pimpin.github.com/about_pimpin/)

It might be a sort of index/portfolio of my works later...

Stay tuned, [follow me.](https://github.com/users/follow?target=pimpin)

Regard's

Pierre
tagline: My own presentation in, on and by Github
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
